definition: to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
according to/to act in accordance with/to depend on/to seize/to occupy
to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)
to lose/to transport/to donate/to enter (a password)

sentences.english: At the same time, the error code in communication is corrected by using of repeat transmittal of data in every cycle.
sentences.chinese: 同时使用数据循环重发，来纠正数据传输中的误码。

sentences.english: A large antenna and several cameras will transmit pictures and data.
sentences.chinese: 一个巨大的天线和几架照相机将进行照片和数据传输。

sentences.english: "The provider detected enormous amounts of data transfers," Vogt said.
sentences.chinese: “该服务商发现有大量的数据传输，”Vogt表示。

sentences.english: This is the main passageway through which data travels.
sentences.chinese: 这是数据传输的主要通道。

sentences.english: Network system, data transmission device, terminal device and multicasting method.
sentences.chinese: 网络系统，数据传输设备，终端设备和组播方法。

sentences.english: The transmission is partitioned into 2 parts of data handclasp and transmission.
sentences.chinese: 其通讯分为握手和数据传输两阶段。

sentences.english: A more secure data-transfer format wouldn't have been accepted.
sentences.chinese: 因此更安全的数据传输格式未得到广泛的接受。
全双工数据传输是什么意思？

sentences.english: In practical application, it is very suitable for high-speed transmission operation.
sentences.chinese: 在实际应用中，适合于高速的数据传输业务。

sentences.english: Data transmission is an important component of the expressway automatic meteorology monitor network.
sentences.chinese: 数据传输是高速公路自动气象监测网的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: Why do I have to obtain and transmit the data to PSB every night?
sentences.chinese: 为什么每天晚上要把数据传输到公安局电脑系统中？

sentences.english: Next up are DTOs or Data Transfer Objects.
sentences.chinese: 下一个是DTO或数据传输对象。

sentences.english: On the other hand, transfer encoding applies to methods of encoding during the actual transmission of the data.
sentences.chinese: 而传输编码是指实际数据传输过程中的编码方法。

sentences.english: We guarantee the unilateralism of data transmission at the level of both hard ware and software.
sentences.chinese: 我们通过硬件及软件两方面来保证数据传输的单向性。

sentences.english: Data transfer and type conversions happen on both ends of the request processing cycle.
sentences.chinese: 数据传输和类型转换在请求处理循环的两端发生。

sentences.english: Data transmission is the base of Telemeter Seismographic Network.
sentences.chinese: 数据传输是遥测地震台网的运行基础之一。

definition: network router/gateway (to Internet or between networks)
